revised_title: The Tubular Enamel Structure and Development in Sparid and Labrid Fish
tldr: The author investigates the tubular enamel structure and development in Sparid and Labrid fish, revealing a unique mode of development that differs from previously described fish enamel. The study demonstrates a regular penetration by vascular tubes and a secreting structure in the enamel organ, providing insight into the functional significance of the tubular enamel in these fish species.
